00020 // URI: <scheme>:<scheme-specific-part>
00021 // URL: <scheme>://<user>:<password>@<host>:<port>/<url-path>
00022 
00023 // ------------------------------------------
00024 // Scheme_Name Description
00025 // ------------------------------------------
00026 // ftp         File Transfer Protocol
00027 // http        Hypertext Transfer Protocol
00028 // news        USENET news
00029 // nntp        USENET news using NNTP access
00030 // wais        Wide Area Information Servers
00031 // gopher      The Gopher Protocol
00032 // mailto      Electronic mail address
00033 // telnet      Reference to interactive sessions
00034 // prospero    Prospero Directory Service
00035 // ------------------------------------------
00036 
00037 // URN: "urn:" <NID> ":" <NSS>
00038 // NID specifies the Namespace ID and NSS specifies the Namespace Specific String.
00039 // URN does not resolve to a unique, physical location. URNs serve as persistent resource identifiers.
00040 
00079 #define U_URL_TO_PARAM(url) (url).getUrlData(),(url).getUrlDataLen()
00080 #define U_URL_TO_TRACE(url) (url).getUrlDataLen(),(url).getUrlData()
00081 
00082 template <class T> class UVector;
00083 
00084 class U_EXPORT Url {
00085 public:
00086 
00087         // Check for memory error
00088         U_MEMORY_TEST
00089 
00090         // Allocator e Deallocator
00091         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00092         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00093 
00094         static UString* str_ftp;
00095         static UString* str_smtp;
00096         static UString* str_pop3;
00097         static UString* str_http;
00098         static UString* str_https;

00105         Url()
00106                 {
00107                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "", 0)
00108 
00109                 service_end = user_begin = user_end = host_begin = host_end = path_begin = path_end = query = -1;
00110                 }
00111 
00119         Url(const UString& x) : url(x)
00120                 {
00121                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x))
00122 
00123                 findpos();
00124                 }
00125 
00133         Url(const char* t, uint32_t tlen) : url(t, tlen)
00134                 {
00135                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "%S,%u", t, tlen)
00136 
00137                 findpos();
00138                 }
00139 
00143         ~Url()
00144                 {
00145                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url)
00146                 }

00150         void set(const Url& u)
00151                 {
00152                 service_end = u.service_end;
00153                 user_begin  = u.user_begin;
00154                 user_end    = u.user_end;
00155                 host_begin  = u.host_begin;
00156                 host_end    = u.host_end;
00157                 path_begin  = u.path_begin;
00158                 path_end    = u.path_end;
00159                 query       = u.query;
00160                 }
00161 
00162         Url(const Url& u) : url(u.url)
00163                 {
00164                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(u)
00165 
00166                 set(u);
00167                 }
00168 
00169         Url& operator=(const Url& u)
00170                 {
00171                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(u)
00172 
00173                 url = u.url;
00174 
00175                 set(u);
00176 
00177                 return *this;
00178                 }

00180         void set(const UString& x);
00181 
00182         UString   get() const { return url; }
00183         bool    empty() const { return url.empty(); }
00184 
00185         const char* getUrlData() const    { return url.data(); }
00186         uint32_t    getUrlDataLen() const { return url.size(); }

00198         bool isHTTP()
00199                 {
00200                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isHTTP()")
00201 
00202                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(str_http)
00203 
00204                 bool result = (getService() == *str_http);
00205 
00206                 U_RETURN(result);
00207                 }
00208 
00209         bool isHTTPS()
00210                 {
00211                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isHTTPS()")
00212 
00213                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(str_https)
00214 
00215                 bool result = (getService() == *str_https);
00216 
00217                 U_RETURN(result);
00218                 }

00227         void setService(const char* service, uint32_t n);

00238         UString getUser();
00239 
00245         bool setUser(const char* user, uint32_t n);
00246 
00250         void eraseUser()
00251                 {
00252                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::eraseUser()")
00253 
00254                 if (user_begin < user_end)
00255                         {
00256                         (void) url.erase(user_begin, user_end + 1);
00257 
00258                         findpos();
00259                         }
00260                 }
00261 
00268         bool isLocalFile()
00269                 {
00270                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isLocalFile()")
00271 
00272                 bool result = (host_begin < host_end ? true : false); // Is there a host ?
00273 
00274                 U_RETURN(result);
00275                 }

00358         bool isQuery()
00359                 {
00360                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isQuery()")
00361 
00362                 bool result = (path_end < (int)(url.size() - 1));
00363 
00364                 U_RETURN(result);
00365                 }

00374         UString  getQuery();

00382         bool setQuery(UVector<UString>& vec);

00384 
00388         void eraseQuery()
00389                 {
00390                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::eraseQuery()")
00391 
00392                 if (path_end < (int)url.size())
00393                         {
00394                         (void) url.erase(path_end);
00395 
00396                         query = path_end;
00397                         }
00398                 }

00465         static void encode(const char* input, uint32_t len, UString& buffer, const char* extra_enc_chars = 0)
00466                 {
00467                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::encode(%.*S,%u,%p,%S)", len, input, len, &buffer, extra_enc_chars)
00468 
00469                 buffer.size_adjust(u_url_encode((const unsigned char*)input, len, (unsigned char*)buffer.data(), extra_enc_chars));
00470 
00471                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.size() = %u", buffer.size())
00472                 }
00473 
00474         static void encode(const UString& input, UString& buffer, const char* extra_enc_chars = 0)
00475                 { encode(input.data(), input.size(), buffer, extra_enc_chars); }
00476 
00484         static void decode(const char* input, uint32_t len, UString& buffer, bool no_line_break = false)
00485                 {
00486                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::decode(%.*S,%u,%p,%b)", len, input, len, &buffer, no_line_break)
00487 
00488                 buffer.size_adjust(u_url_decode(input, len, (unsigned char*)buffer.data(), no_line_break));
00489 
00490                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.size() = %u", buffer.size())
00491                 }
00492 
00493         static void decode(const UString& input, UString& buffer, bool no_line_break = false)
00494                 { decode(U_STRING_TO_PARAM(input), buffer, no_line_break); }
00495

00510         UString url;      // Content string - not first for object dump...
00511         int service_end,  // End position of the service.
00512                  user_begin,   // begin position of the user.
00513                  user_end,     // end position of the user.
00514                  host_begin,   // begin position of the host.
00515                  host_end,     // end position of the host.
00516                  path_begin,   // begin position of the path.
00517                  path_end,     // end position of the path.
00518                  query;        // start position of the last readed query entry.
